background: Custom Tees aims to achieve specific click targets from young and old age groups through a selection of different ad types, each with its own characteristics and limitations.
constraints: Total clicks from young individuals must meet or exceed GoalYoung
Total clicks from old individuals must meet or exceed GoalOld
Total unique clicks from young individuals must meet or exceed GoalUniqueYoung
Total unique clicks from old individuals must meet or exceed GoalUniqueOld
Number of clicks from each ad type must not exceed its MaxClicks
Number of clicks for each ad type must be non-negative
objective: Minimize the overall cost while meeting the young and old click goals
description: Custom Tees wants to optimize its ad clicks. Their plan is to meet certain goals for clicks from both young and old age groups. They have a set target of \param{GoalYoung} clicks by young individuals, \param{GoalOld} clicks by old individuals, \param{GoalUniqueYoung} unique clicks by young, and \param{GoalUniqueOld} unique clicks by old. They can gather clicks from a total of A different ad types. Each ad type provides a varying number of clicks by young individuals \param{YoungClicks} and by old individuals \param{OldClicks}. Each ad type also incurs different costs \param{Costs}, has a maximum limit for the number of clicks \param{MaxClicks}, and provides a number of unique clicks \param{UniqueClicks}. Custom Tees wants to know how many clicks from each ad type should they purchase to minimize the overall cost while meeting their click goals.

parameters.definition: Total goal for clicks by young individuals
Total goal for clicks by old individuals
Total goal for unique clicks by young individuals
Total goal for unique clicks by old individuals
Number of clicks by young individuals for each ad type
Number of clicks by old individuals for each ad type
Cost associated with each ad type
Maximum number of clicks possible for each ad type
Number of unique clicks for each ad type
